testcase.classname: To test Jupiter Test Toys Application
testcase.name: To validate error messages and mandatory fields on Contact Page
testcase.system-out: Given initialise the browser opening "Planit Jupiter Toys"..................passed When user navigates to "contact" in header section and validates page URL...passed Then user clicks on "Submit" button.........................................passed And user populates mandatory fields and show them in the report.............passed And user verify error message "Forename is required" and enter value as "Saurabh".passed And user verify error message "Email is required" and enter value as "saurabh@xyz.com".passed And user verify error message "Message is required" and enter value as "Hello there!".passed Then user clicks on "Submit" button.........................................passed

testcase.classname: To test Jupiter Test Toys Application
testcase.name: To validate successful submission message on Contact page
testcase.system-out: Given initialise the browser opening "Planit Jupiter Toys"..................passed When user navigates to "contact" in header section and validates page URL...passed Then user populates mandatory fields without clicking Submit button and show them in report.passed Then user clicks on "Submit" button.........................................passed And user verify error message "Forename is required" and enter value as "Sehrawat".passed And user verify error message "Email is required" and enter value as "sehrawat@xyz.com".passed And user verify error message "Message is required" and enter value as "Dear Sehrawat!".passed Then user clicks on "Submit" button.........................................passed And user validates successful message after submitting form.................passed

testcase.classname: To test Jupiter Test Toys Application
testcase.name: To validate shopping functionality in the cart and subtotals of items added
testcase.system-out: Given initialise the browser opening "Planit Jupiter Toys"..................passed When user navigates to "shop" in header section and validates page URL......passed Then user buy 2 "Stuffed Frog" and add to shopping cart and get the product price.passed Then user buy 5 "Fluffy Bunny" and add to shopping cart and get the product price.passed Then user buy 3 "Valentine Bear" and add to shopping cart and get the product price.passed And user go to shopping "cart" page.........................................passed Then user verify subtotal and price for each product in the cart............passed And user verify sum total value of all the products in the cart.............passed
